reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: El Salvador Area Development Project

description.narrative: This urban programme, works for achieving access to education and health services for the children, life skills development for the youth and for the strengthening of community capacities in Villa Maria del Triunfo - Villa El Salvador,Lima ? Peru. The prog ramme is located in one of the poorest areas of Lima, presenting precarious access to health centers, roads and public services. There are high levels of malnutrition and anemia in the children. Through working in partnership we are improving the reading c omprehension skills in children, Likewise we are working for the development of life skills for the youth. For those children who are undernourished and present high levels of anemia, we partner with the health centers in order to monitor and improve the n utrition of the children, specially of the most vulnerable cases. The programme benefits 12.400 people approximately. The main partner is World Vision Peru, which is responsible for the programme implementation and for the utilization of the programme reso urces.
